issue.title: [CF 1480] Comparing debuff duration from arena1,arena2, arena3
issue.body:
I want to track rip duration for arena1,2,3 and only show the rip with the lowest duration so i know which one to refresh first....Any ideas?


> Posted by CurseForge user Talason84891 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1480 | Raw

comments.body:
Make a buff/debuff icon to track Rip, track units arena1-3, prioritize low duration, and display the unit's name in the icon's text displays, e.g. "[Unit:Name]". Or, for something a little more practical, try "[Unit:Class] ([Unit:Name])"


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I want 3 different icons, one next to each gladius frame....not just one icon :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Talason84891
